summary: Makes small changes to the sun damage spells for vampires so that you have to be in direct sunlight to get affected by the sun.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Realistic Vampire Sunlight Damage
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]2.0
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]20/08/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]gameplay Effects and Changes
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]SoulLimit
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
DLC: Dawnguard is required for this mod to work
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
Adds in new checks for the sun damage for vampires to make it so that unless you are in direct sunlight, you do not get affected by the sun.

For you to be affected, you it has to be sunny for a start, if it is raining, foggy, snowing or any other kind of bad weather, you should be fine. If it is sunny, and you are under cover, or in shade, you will be safe from the sun\'s affects. I have also removed the bright effect and sound for when you move into sunlight, as if you are moving through shade and sun it can get very annoying.

[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
To install this mod manually unpack the RAR file to your Skyrim/Data folder.

[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
To uninstall this mod manually you must delete the esp from your Skyrim/Data folder, and then delete the 2 scripts (Found easily by the \"SL_\" tag on the front) from your Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder.

[color=Red][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
This mod will be incompatible with any mod that does the same as this. It is also likely to not work properly with other vampire mods.

If you want a mod that includes this but also changes vampires, why not try my other mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20370]Vampirism Enhanced[/url]. It changes vampires so they are more lore friendly but also fun to play.

[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]

Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
